com.canabang.genietext.core.model
Class SmsServiceProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.model.SmsServiceProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SmsTransitServiceProvider
public abstract class SmsServiceProvider
extends Object
implements Runnable

A service that the system provides. Every service has a log that has a record of all work that was done on it, a list of subscribers, an associated mail server, a message filter, and a request processor generator.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Field Summary
protected  AddressSet filter
          A set of addresses that will be filtered and will not be processed.

          Generates request processors.

          The mail server associated with this service.

Constructor Detail

SmsServiceProvider

public SmsServiceProvider(int clockFormat,
                          ConnectionInfo imap,
                          ConnectionInfo smtp,
                          String subsOutputFile)
                   throws MessagingException,
                          TransformerConfigurationException
Creates a service with the specified properties.

Parameters:
clockFormat - The format to display times in. Anything other than 24 assumes the default 12-hour format.
imap - Information required to connect to the IMAP mail server.
smtp - Information required to connect to the SMTP mail server.
subsOutputFile - Subscription output file path.
Throws:
MessagingException - If there is a problem connecting to the remote service or in the event that the server could not authenticate the connection or the required folder(s) could not be opened/accessed.
TransformerConfigurationException - If an output XML file could not be properly configured and set up to output the subscription list.
Method Detail

getGenerator

public ProcessorFactory getGenerator()
Retrieves the request processor generator for this service.

Returns:
The processor generator for this service.

getLog

public DefaultListModel getLog()
Retrieves the log for this service.

Returns:
The log storing all work done on this service.

getServer

public EmailServer getServer()
Retrieves the mail server associated with this service.

Returns:
The mail server this service uses to receive requests and send responses.

getSubscribers

public DefaultListModel getSubscribers()
Retrieves the list of subscribers associated with this service.

Returns:
The subscribers that signed up for this service.

stop

public void stop()
          throws MessagingException
Stops this service and runs the JVM garbage collection.

Throws:
MessagingException - If there is a problem shutting down the mail server.
